selectqueries.amazonHomePageTest: select t1.testcasename, t1.environment, t1.execute, t1.searchItem,t1.subSearchItem, t2.priority from amazonhomepagetest t1 left join amazon_testcase_runnerlist t2 on t1.testcasename = t2.testcasename where t1.environment='QA' and t1.execute='Yes';
selectqueries.orangeHrmTest: select t1.testcasename, t1.environment, t1.execute, t1.userFirstName,t1.userLastName,t1.password, t2.priority from dashboardaccesstest t1 left join orange_testcase_runnerlist t2 on t1.testcasename = t2.testcasename where t1.environment='QA' and t1.execute='Yes';

updatequeries.tc002_dashboardaccesstest: select * from tc002_dashboardaccesstest t1 left join testcase_priority_list t2 on t1.testcasename = t2.testcasename where t1.environment='QA';
updatequeries.tc003_dashboardaccesstest: select * from tc003_dashboardaccesstest t1 left join testcase_priority_list t2 on t1.testcasename = t2.testcasename where t1.environment='QA';
